DESCRIPTION:
Start your career at the Head of Emergency Services and take control of the rescue workers at a modern ambulance station.

Coordinate and command vehicles and personnel, while overseeing the development of your ambulance station. During your working day, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll encounter exciting and realistic operational scenarios - including road traffic accidents, emergency rescues and natural disasters, as well as simple ambulance runs.

Keep track of your emergency service teams with the help of the detailed city map and keep an overview of the goings-on in your operational area at all times. Once a team reaches the scene of an emergency, the game automatically switches to a tactical view, allowing you to control the actions of your unit on the ground. Thanks to the integrated rescue service guidelines, you can accurately examine and treat casualties - this calls for intense concentration and sure instincts.

Remember: every second counts, and saves lives!

Manage your rescue personnel, buy new vehicles and upgrade the station

*Realistic sounds: Sirens, voices and ambient noises
Career Mode and Freeplay Mode
